_sText: Three trains are being attacked by a group of terrorists. Watch out for rocks, bridges among other things that will appear during the ride! Terrorists: Hijack the convoy by assassinating the seal team escort, or sabotage the train with explosives in two key areas. Counter Terrorists: Protect the convoy at all costs. This map can run 16 vs 16 matches, but having such a big amount of players on the field can heavily affect your frame rate. All credits go to FictiousWill (wrsmith2@gmail.com) for creating this beautiful map. Enjoy!
